name: Breadrunner (IwKy)
description:
Breadrunner is an infinIte scrolling platformer game similar to Google's Dino. Its a pretty simple game made for the purpose of practicing game development. More updates are not planned as of right now, but who knows what will happen in the future.

Controls:

Use Space on keyboards and Button South on Controllers to jump in game, the longer you hold the button the higher the jump.
